thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: K.M.

author: K.M.
title: K.M.
text: I have really appreciated the lower fare alert - saved me over 100$ . Is also good for watching trends for future trips. The process of booking was seamless. My only complaint was follow up emails re booking insurance and a seat ( both of which I had just already declined ) and another email to book hotel and car rental - could be useful I guess for some. Thanks for your competitive helpful service.
